alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 1:36PM PDT until August 08 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR LIGHTNING UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... .Scattered thunderstorms will continue to develop into mid evening in the Burns BLM as monsoonal moisture increases from northern Nevada. A very dry layer near the surface will limit rainfall and gusty outflow winds are expected. Monsoonal moisture will increase further on Tuesday with additional thunderstorms and gusty winds, but these storms will contain more rainfall which may help limit the spread of new fires. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR BURNS BLM...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 636... * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...40-55 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
